connectionToPtLawrence: Lived with her parents at Alderbrook Farm on Orcas Island. Married Cecil Willis there in June 1902.

family.parents: George Nelson Culver and Diana Louise Aikens
family.spouses: Cecil Swainson Willis (b. July 20, 1873 in England; d. between 1920-1930)
family.siblings: Otis Henry Culver, Fred Nelson Culver, Inez Adel Culver

Living with her parents in Orcas

Louise and Cecil were living in Orcas; Cecil was a fruit farmer
Louise and Cecil were living in Olga, San Juan, Washington; Cecil was a farmer
Louise was a widow living in Olga

miscellaneous: Also known as 'Lou'. Wedding at Alderbrook in 1902 had granddaughters Evelyn (6) and Leda (4) as flower girls.
researchQuestions: When exactly did Cecil Willis die (between 1920-1930)?
